info.name: Telugu-English Learning Platform - Complete API
info.description: Complete API collection for Telugu-English Learning Platform including Activity Management, Adaptive Learning, Initial Assessment, Learning Paths, Analytics, and all other endpoints.

query.description: Sort field: created_at, difficulty, type, points
Sort by: created_at, difficulty, type, points

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Business English Mastery",
  "description": "Complete business English course for Telugu speakers",
  "difficulty_level": "intermediate",
  "learning_goals": ["business", "presentation"],
  "focus_areas": ["vocabulary", "writing"],
  "estimated_duration_weeks": 12,
  "custom_requirements": "Focus on email writing and presentations"
}

{
  "title": "Business Email Writing",
  "topic": "Professional Email Communication",

  "estimated_duration_minutes": 45,
  "learning_objectives": ["Write professional emails", "Use formal language"],
  "prerequisites": ["Basic grammar", "Vocabulary fundamentals"]
}

{
  "title": "Telugu for Healthcare Workers",
  "description": "Learn Telugu vocabulary and phrases for healthcare settings",

  "duration_weeks": 8
